title: 26 KEY Differences Between THE CROWN Season 4 and REAL LIFE!
author: Think Story
comment:
👑 I think they did a pretty good job at being accurate. What did you think? 👑
Like this vid? Check out my Crown Season 4 Ending and Hidden Details Video:  https://youtu.be/5j3Od3oOhdo
They chose a way more attractive actress for Camilla than the real Camilla.
If Charles was even half of the petulant spoiled man child as portrayed in this series then he deserves all the scrutiny he has gotten and more.
If everytime u tell ur partner you love them and they say whatever love means thats a red flag already.
The casting is absolutely splendid in this show. All of the actors look uncannily like their real life counterparts, especially Josh O'connor and Emma Corrin as Charles and Diana. 😍♥️
description:
The Crown Season 4 has just released on Netflix, but how well does it stand up to historical accuracy and real life? Find out the true story and differences between the show and real life.
